title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.15 - Improper packing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.15 - Improper packing

State Regulations

All freight not packed in packages suitable for standing the
ordinary handling incident to its movement or transportation, may at the
discretion of the chairman or any person delegated by him, be rejected or
repacked at the expense of shipper, consignee or other party responsible for
same. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
